DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy adverse effect pulse dye laser intense pulsed light patient skin telangiectasia redness .
DOC.brief_title: Pulsed Dye Laser Intense Pulsed Light ( IPL ) Treatment Telangiectasia Skin Redness
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Skin type I , II , III No previous laser IPL treatment condition Younger 18 year old Skin type IV , V , VI Pregnant lactate woman Previous laser IPL treatment condition Recent exposure sun sunbeds Treatment oral retinoid within 6 month Tendency produce hypertrophic scar keloid
